notes:
### v1.4.1
#### NEW FEATURES
- added option to show raid gates in logs
- added optional damage taken tab (settings > general > show tanked)
- added optional bosses tab (settings > general > show bosses)
#### BUG FIXES & IMPROVEMENTS
- updated boss only damage icon
full patch notes on github
send bug reports/suggestions to discord.gg/sbSa3pkDF5
